text: My note  I love life  Well  I love the  idea  of life  I hate the  execution   I don t think that death is worse than life  Just different  And I want to try it out  So  that s what I m doing  trying death out   All of you that I ve met here in life I love  You made me the woman I am today and was yesterday  Please don t think me unthankful  I ve lived for a long time now and I ll miss you  I love you  I really do I ve been called tenacious and I don t think this act disproves my tenacity  I think it proves it  Death is so feared by so many  It is seen as  less than  life  I welcome and invite it    Life is hard  and I ve lived life as the only way I could  I m sorry I overwhelmed all of you so much  I love you all  I love you mom and dad  I m sorry we didn t get along better  I love you Brock  and I m sorry that we didn t get along better  All of my friends  I love you  I mean that   It took me a long while to make this decision  I finally came to the realization that I am the most important person in my life  and I feel that I have the right to make this decision on my own   No one could have stopped me  I did this on my own   I ve done my best to clean up the mess I left behind  Goodbye

text: Why is suicide looked down upon but mental health is often overlooked during the entire buildup What s the point of going on when you lost everything  No family anymore  no gf anymore  no joy in life anymore  no pursuit of knowledge  due to depression confiding you to a bed  no bettering of yourself through exercise due to debilitating monotony of earning a paycheck bi weekly while executives earn  x your salary for your menial work I read that Alan Turing  who was a brilliant computer scientist and responsible for saving millions of lives during World War   was forced to be chemically castrated for being gay  His hormones got fucked up and took away all joy in his life  his thirst for knowledge  and eventually made him take his own life  Was he weak  No  but defeated  chemically and without purpose   We re told suicide is selfish  But if it is so selfish  why do people abandon you at your lowest and leave you to deal with what seems insurmountable at the time all alone  Where were they when they proclaimed that suicide is a selfish act when you were going weeks months in pain trying to fix a mess without any support   Nobody wants to hear your problems  If you bring them up they will tell you to hopeful things with empty words then disappear for a while  Life s short  you fuck up and are in it alone then good luck  People will always remember your wins  but when you talk about mental health all of a sudden it gets weird and stigmatized  Then you ask yourself am I doing enough  is it worth bringing up  or is the harsh truth I never had any support to begin with
summary: Mental health is often overlooked during the buildup to suicide. Alan Turing was forced to be chemically castrated for being gay and he took his own life. People abandon you at your lowest and leave you to deal with what seems insurmountable.
cleaned: mental health overlook buildup suicide alan turing force chemically castrate gay take life people abandon low leave deal insurmountable

text: My life has turned to shitMy life has gone down hill As I m laying in my apartment with my power shut off  looking to find my next fix with drugs I can get my hands on and selling items on offer up to have enough to put something in my belly I ve gotten emotional and just need to vent   Two year ago my parents left the country  leaving me an apartment half way paid off  I had a job making decent money and have gotten promoted shortly after their leave twice in the span of a year  being employed there for six years I was finally happy making close to  k after taxes   From a young age of eighteen I worked in the nightlife industry as a side gig  on and off which got me into the party lifestyle  I d regularly work my day job for nine hours and two to three times a week I d work at a club hosting or doing security till nearly   am  That s where my problem with drugs started   The picture I painted isn t too detailed but gives enough inside to now tell you the flip side  Since January I ve haven t had a job  any money I had has gone towards keeping myself happy through stimulation  I had my car repossessed  only to purchase it back  sell it and use all the money on more drugs  during that time I was nearly ready to pull the trigger and end it all but I didn t   My friends have come and tried to aid  my parents have sent money and tried to help  Yet I m lost feeling like I m stuck in limbo  I just got a message on OfferUp to purchase my snowboard and it made me cry remembering what my life was like when I was actually alive  I m not writing this expecting an answer to my issues or a pick me up  I just hope someone out there doesn t commit the same mistakes if you realize having issues similar to mine early on in life  I m   about to turn   it s not too late for me but I wish I d have a different outlook and self control earlier on
summary: Two years ago his parents left the country leaving him an apartment half way paid off. He had a job making decent money and got promoted twice in the span of a year. Since January he hasn't had any job and he's been using the money for drugs. His car was repossessed and he used the money to buy a snowboard.
